title: create new annotation
description: This endpoint takes an annotation in the W3C Web Annotation Data Model format (https://www.w3.org/TR/annotation-model/) and saves it to the database
name: create_annotation

Request body(JSON).description: (see W3C Web Annotation Data Model for details)

title: deletes the annotation specified by the id
description: This endpoint deletes the annotation specified by the id
name: delete_annotation

title: returns the annotation specified by the id
description: This endpoint returns the annotation specified by the id in the W3C Web Annotation Data Model format (https://www.w3.org/TR/annotation-model/)
name: get_annotation

body(JSON).description: (see W3C Web Annotation Data Model for details)

title: lists the annotations filtered by creator, target_creator, target_source
description: This endpoint returns a list of annotations in the W3C Web Annotation Data Model format (https://www.w3.org/TR/annotation-model/) filtered by creator, target_creator, target_source
name: list_annotation

body(JSON).description: (see W3C Web Annotation Data Model for details)

Success 200.description: chat history with all users (ordered by date)
number of new messages from that user

URL.description: what type of data to be searched (exercise/user)

Success 200.description: username of the user (optional: only for user type)
id of the exercise (optional: only for exercise)
title of the exercise (optional: only for exercise)
language of the exercise (optional: only for exercise)
type of the exercise (optional: only for exercise)
level of the exercise (optional: only for exercise)
tags of the exercise (optional: only for exercise)
